items.title: 2 Stocks to Buy If This Tariff-Fueled Market Downturn Continues
items.description: The stock market is on a volatility roller coaster.  What we do control is taking advantage of any dips in the stock market and buying shares in companies on our watchlists that have gone on sale.  If this stock market downturn continues, here are two stocks to buy for your portfolio and hold for the long haul.
